chapter_metadata.subject: English
chapter_metadata.chapter_name: P. V. Sindhu – An Icon of Success

questions.question: Who is P. V. Sindhu?
questions.answer: Badminton player

questions.question: P. V. Sindhu is famous for which sport?
questions.answer: Badminton

questions.question: Which country does P. V. Sindhu represent?
questions.answer: India

questions.question: What quality of Sindhu is highlighted in the lesson?
questions.answer: Hard work and determination

questions.question: Who inspired P. V. Sindhu in her career?
questions.answer: Her parents and coach

questions.question: Which major achievement made Sindhu famous worldwide?
questions.answer: Olympic medal

questions.question: The lesson shows that success comes from:
questions.answer: Hard work and discipline

questions.question: What does Sindhu’s life teach students?
questions.answer: Work hard and stay focused

questions.question: Which value is most important in Sindhu’s journey?
questions.answer: Perseverance

questions.question: P. V. Sindhu is an icon of:
questions.answer: Success

questions.question: P. V. Sindhu is an icon of:
questions.answer: Success

questions.question: Who is P. V. Sindhu?
questions.answer: P. V. Sindhu is a famous Indian badminton player and Olympic medalist.

questions.question: Why is P. V. Sindhu called an icon of success?
questions.answer: Because of her hard work, discipline, and international achievements.

questions.question: What qualities helped Sindhu achieve success?
questions.answer: Hard work, determination, discipline, and perseverance.

questions.question: How does Sindhu inspire students?
questions.answer: She inspires students to work hard and never give up.

questions.question: What message does the lesson give?
questions.answer: Success is achieved through dedication and continuous effort.
